name: Forbidden Confessions: My Neighbor's Daughter
description:
As our Forbidden Confessions series continue, this second entry features the confession story of Mr. Jacobs, a boring man in his 40s now living alone after he left her former wife due to an affair. It's been years since that incident, but when Mr. Jacobs is just about to move on, something unexpected happened.

A new family moved out of his neighborhood and immediately developed an interest in him. This new family soon got close to Mr. Jacobs... all too close.
